mapper.select: SELECT WP_SID AS WPSID, WP_TITLE AS WPTITLE, WP_CONTENT AS WPCONTENT, WP_START AS WPSTART, WP_END AS WPEND, WP_ADDR1 AS WPADDR1, WP_CREATED AS WPCREATED, WP_MAX_PET AS WPMAXPET, IP_SID AS IPSID, WL_SID AS WLSID FROM WALK_POST
SELECT IWPT_SID AS IWPTSID, IWPT_NAME AS IWPTNAME FROM INDEX_WALK_POST_TAG ORDER BY IWPT_SID
SELECT IWI_SID AS IWISID, IWI_PRICE AS IWIPRICE, IWI_POSSIBLE_MATCH_COUNTS AS IWICOUNT, IWI_GRADE AS IWIGRADE FROM INDEX_WALK_INFO

SELECT WB.WB_SID AS WBSID, WB.WB_START AS WBSTART, WB.WB_END AS WBEND FROM WALK_CANCEL WCL JOIN WALK_BOOK WB ON WCL.WB_SID = WB.WB_SID JOIN WALK_CREATE_CART WCC ON WB.WCC_SID = WCC.WCC_SID JOIN MEMBER MEM ON WCC.MEM_SID = MEM.MEM_SID JOIN JOIN_MEMBER JM ON MEM.MEM_SID = JM.MEM_SID WHERE WCL.WCL_DATE = SYSDATE AND JM.MEM_SID = #{memSid}
SELECT WRSID, WRTITLE, WRCONTENT, WRRATING, WRDATE, MEMSID, PMEMSID, WBSID, WBSTART, WBEND FROM WALK_REVIEW_VIEW WHERE WRDATE = SYSDATE AND MEMSID = #{memSid}

SELECT WRR.WP_SID AS WPSID FROM WALK_REPORT_COMPLETE WRC JOIN INDEX_MANAGER_ACTION IMA ON WRC.IMA_SID = IMA.IMA_SID JOIN WALK_REPORT_RECEIVE WRR ON WRC.WRR_SID = WRR.WRR_SID WHERE IMA.IMA_SID = 4 AND WRC.WRC_DATE = SYSDATE AND WRR.WP_SID = ( SELECT WP.WP_SID FROM WALK_POST WP JOIN WALK_LICENSE WL ON WP.WL_SID = WL.WL_SID JOIN WALK_FOLLOWING_LIST WFL ON WL.WL_SID = WFL.WL_SID JOIN MEMBER MEM ON WFL.MEM_SID = MEM.MEM_SID JOIN JOIN_MEMBER JM ON MEM.MEM_SID = JM.MEM_SID WHERE MEM.MEM_SID = #{memSid})

SELECT TO_CHAR(WB.WB_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WBSTART, TO_CHAR(WB.WB_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WBEND , MEM.MEM_SID AS PMEMSID, WB.WB_SID AS WBSID FROM WALK_BOOK WB JOIN WALK_CREATE_CART WCC ON WB.WCC_SID = WCC.WCC_SID JOIN MEMBER MEM ON WCC.MEM_SID = MEM.MEM_SID WHERE WB.WB_DATE = SYSDATE AND WCC.MEM_SID = #{memSid}

SELECT TO_CHAR(WB.WB_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WBSTART, TO_CHAR(WB.WB_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WBEND, MEM.MEM_SID AS MEMSID, WB.WB_SID AS WBSID FROM WALK_BOOK WB JOIN WALK_LICENSE WL ON WB.WL_SID = WL.WL_SID JOIN WALK_TEST_SUBMIT WTS ON WL.WTS_SID = WTS.WTS_SID JOIN WALK_TEST_RECEIVE WTR ON WTS.WTR_SID = WTR.WTR_SID JOIN MEMBER MEM ON WTR.MEM_SID = MEM.MEM_SID WHERE WB.WB_DATE = SYSDATE AND MEM.MEM_SID = #{memSid}

SELECT TO_CHAR(WB.WB_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WBSTART, TO_CHAR(WB.WB_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WBEND, MEM.MEM_SID AS MEMSID, WB.WB_SID AS WBSID FROM WALK_BOOK WB JOIN WALK_LICENSE WL ON WB.WL_SID = WL.WL_SID JOIN WALK_TEST_SUBMIT WTS ON WL.WTS_SID = WTS.WTS_SID JOIN WALK_TEST_RECEIVE WTR ON WTS.WTR_SID = WTR.WTR_SID JOIN MEMBER MEM ON WTR.MEM_SID = MEM.MEM_SID WHERE MEM.MEM_SID = #{memSid} ORDER BY WB.WB_DATE DESC
SELECT WRSID, WRTITLE, WRCONTENT, WRRATING, WRDATE, MEMSID, PMEMSID, WBSID, WBSTART, WBEND FROM WALK_REVIEW_VIEW WHERE MEMSID = #{memSid} ORDER BY WRDATE DESC
SELECT JM_NICKNAME AS PJMNICKNAME, MEM_SID AS PMEMSID FROM JOIN_MEMBER
